practiceAreas: Business and Commercial Law|Commercial Litigation|Construction Litigation
description:
At our Plantation law firm, Kelsky Law, P.A., our commitment is to provide practical solutions to complex legal problems. Since attorney Brad E. Kelsky established our firm in 2006, we have done just that, helping countless individuals and businesses throughout the State of Florida to overcome a broad range of legal challenges, including those related to the following:

  • Personal injury and wrongful death
  • Contract litigation
  • Commercial litigation
  • Mold-related litigation
  • Noncompete issues
  • Construction law

Mr. Kelsky began his legal career as an insurance defense lawyer. During this phase of his career, he learned about the methods insurance companies use to attempt to minimize benefits. Since founding our firm, he has used that experience to the benefit of many of our firm's clients. In addition, our highly respected associate attorney, Barbara O. Llinas, uses her extensive legal knowledge to ensure justice prevails for our clients, regardless of their legal needs.

If you face a legal challenge in one of our practice areas, you can turn to our law firm, Kelsky Law, P.A., for representation and solid advice. If you would like to discuss your issue with one of our attorneys, we offer a free consultation.
